comment: "I had cold-pitched an editor here a while back, and while she declined that particular story, she encouraged me to reach out again in the future with other ideas. About a month later, she reached out and asked if I'd like to review a show (800-900 words), and offered me a flat $75 rate. This was for the paper's Artseen section."
relationship: Solicited pitch (editor asked you to pitch)
